en.title: Solar Installer Management System | PraticOS
en.description: Stop losing leads on WhatsApp! System for solar installers with project documentation, installation history and financial control. Get organized in 5 minutes.
en.keywords: solar installer software, solar energy management system, photovoltaic installer app, solar business software, solar work order system
en.ogDescription: Stop losing leads! System with project documentation, installation history and financial control. Get organized in 5 minutes.

hero.title: Stop losing leads:
hero.subtitle: End the WhatsApp chaos and know exactly how much you made. Complete project documentation, installation checklist with photos and customer tracking on their phone.

problems.title: Do you face
problems.subtitle: Common pain points for solar energy professionals

items.title: Leads lost in WhatsApp
items.text: Interested customer sends a message and you forget to reply. When you remember, they already closed with a competitor.

items.title: Multiple monitoring platforms
items.text: Each inverter has its own app. You waste time switching between platforms to track installations.

items.title: Slow and inconsistent proposals
items.text: Each salesperson makes proposals differently. Takes too long to prepare and the customer gives up while waiting.

items.title: Unstable equipment prices
items.text: Panel and inverter prices change every week. You make a proposal and by closing time, you've lost margin.

items.title: No sales funnel control
items.text: You don't know how many leads you have, how many proposals were sent, or conversion rate. Selling blind.

items.title: Business depends only on you
items.text: If you stop, the company stops. You can't delegate because there's no documented process.

solutions.title: How
solutions.subtitle: Features designed for daily solar installer operations

items.title: Link for customer tracking
items.text: Customer receives a link and tracks installation status in real time.

items.title: Complete installation history
items.text: Search by customer and see the complete history. Equipment installed, power rating, activation date.

items.title: Installation checklist with photos
items.text: Document each step: roof before, mounting structure, modules, inverter, panel. All with photos.

items.title: Automatic total calculation
items.text: Add equipment and labor, the system calculates everything automatically. No errors.

items.title: Complete financial dashboard
items.text: Know exactly how much you made this month.
items.highlight: Full control over costs and margins.

items.title: Quote via WhatsApp
items.text: Send professional proposals in 2 clicks. Customer approves right on their phone.

checklist.title: Solar
checklist.text: Document each installation step and have a complete project record. Customer signs digitally.

items.text: Roof photos (before installation)
Mounting structure installed
Photovoltaic modules positioned
Inverter and protection panel
Generation test and configuration
Customer digital signature

features.title: Everything you need to
features.subtitle: Powerful and intuitive tools to boost your productivity

items.title: Digital WO
items.text: Create complete work orders with photos, project documentation and values. All organized.

items.title: Unlimited Photos
items.text: Photograph each installation step. Document the before, during and after of every project.

items.title: Professional PDF
items.text: Generate proposals and reports in PDF. Professionalism that impresses customers.

items.title: Financial Control
items.text: See how much you billed, received and have to receive. Complete dashboard.

items.title: Customer Management
items.text: Complete history of each customer and installation. All previous maintenance.

items.title: Tracking Link
items.text: Customer tracks installation status on their phone. No need to call.

testimonial.quote: Before I was losing leads on WhatsApp and had no control over proposals sent. Now I have the entire funnel organized and can track each project from start to finish.
testimonial.name: Carlos Mendes

faq.title: Frequently asked
faq.subtitle: Get your questions answered before you start

items.question: Do I need to pay to use it?
items.answer: No! The free plan is real and has no time limit. You can use it forever with up to 30 photos/month. Our pricing is transparent and you don't need to talk to a salesperson.

items.question: Does it work for any company size?
items.answer: Yes! PraticOS works from individual installers to companies with technician teams. The system adapts to your business.

items.question: Can I document installations with photos?
items.answer: Yes! The installation checklist allows you to photograph each step: roof, structure, modules, inverter, panel. Everything is saved in the customer history.

items.question: Will my technicians be able to use it?
items.answer: Absolutely! PraticOS was made to be as simple as using WhatsApp. If you know how to use a phone, you know how to use PraticOS.

items.question: What if I need help?
items.answer: We have email support and complete documentation. We respond within 24 business hours. Our team knows the daily routine of solar installers.

download.title: Download now and
download.text: Available for iOS and Android. Start free!

contact.title: Need
contact.subtitle: Our team is ready to assist you
